5 stars
S C. 05/16/2006
Check out the new Gyros sandwich
Provided by Judy's Book
I saw this on a billboard and thought a gyro at a fast food restaurant? Right. Well, I was wrong. My husband brought a couple home last night for supper and they're really good. The roast beef is seasoned lightly. It is all roast beef. Most gyros are a mixture of beef and lamb. The cucumber sauce (I can't remember how to spell what it's really called.) is great. Cool and just a little spicy. It also has lettuce, tomatoes and red onions. The pita bread was very fresh. If you like Greek food, give it a try. I also recommend a couple of potato cakes on the side! Yum!The service at this particular Arby's is usually good. As with all fast food restaurants, you might want to check for condiments if you're going through the drive-through.
